job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pModis has partnered with a unique company located in the Seattle WA area to help find an experienced Software Engineer The Client is a GIS software and services firm and they create custom applications for both the web as well as distributed and scalable workflow applications Many of their applications rely on specialty GISmapping software especially from the MapInfo family of productsppbrppAs a Software Engineer you will be responsible for creating custom web and desktop applications in a collaborative team environment writing mostly in stronguC and JavascriptTypescriptustrong and using numerous third party packages including cartographic and database tools About 80 of your time will be spent creating features  planning research writing code including unit tests and reviewing You will also support the Operations team in their work on acceptance testing deployment and technical support The other 20 of your time will be spent on agile process meetings including daily standups ad hoc planning meetings biweekly retrospectives lunch and learn events and staff meetingsppbrppbrppstronguSkills You Will UseustrongppbrppemTECHNICALemppbrpp 4 years of professional software engineeringdevelopment experiencepp Write front and backend code with unit testspp Model solutions to geometric cartographic and statistical problemspp Solve bugs efficientlypp Take unfamiliar code and figure out what it is doingpp Create complex SQL queries and analyze indexing for performancepp Ability to quickly learn new software and technical skillspp Ability to research and troubleshoot technical issuespp Ability to follow and understand a complex distributed algorithmppbrppemSOCIALCOOPERATIVEemppbrpp Strong written and oral communication skillspp Collaborative approach with team memberspp Ability to prioritize and shift smoothly between taskspp Resolve interpersonal conflicts professionallypp Ability to accept and offer constructive feedbackpp Willingness to ask for and offer help as neededpp Willingness to take ownership of responsibilities and decisionspp Active engagement with commitment to helping create an inclusive workplaceppbrppstronguBenefitsustrongppbrpp a comprehensive health insurance planpp company matching 401K retirement planpp standard business holidays including your birthdaypp sick and safe time exceeding the requirements of Seattle lawpp vacation time starting at 10 days per year and increasing to a maximum of 17 days per yearpp a yearly profitsharing bonuspp optional 40 hours paid volunteer timepp annual COLA salary adjustmentspp Monthly opposite days to pursue innovation ideas and present to the teamp
